### Story Rule:
The substance that turns an organism into a Zamani warrior is a purple liquid.
In the first half of 2039, the human army prepared a top-secret war vehicle by unearthing a giant Zamani warrior. A young Indian man named Mayank Mehta volunteered for this experiment, which injected the young man with the blood of the giant Zamani warrior.
About 30 years passed, and the little boy now grew into a strong and adult man. After he woke up, the young man realized that he not only had all the skills, but also the powerful characteristics of a Zamani warrior and became an elite killer.
However, the same day, another man named Raj Rai refused to sign the Penal Code and then revealed to his superior officer, Bigglesworth, the hidden secret of the experiment as a gesture that it was Mayank who failed the injection.
The panic of the meager army caused Mayank to realize that he had lost his memories during the experiment, so he condemned the sacrifice of countless innocent people in order to save his personal livelihood and weak will. Mayank planned to Ô¨Çee to America to save himself, but was intercepted by Major Gibbs.
The policeman pursued Mayank all the way in a huge golden van. As he left the country, the dirty and smelly vehicles behind him broke apart from the crushing impact. The warriors left in the van were eleeminkgon, a large alien race of six. They belong to a race first appeared in the 1960s, who have magically merged with mankind and given them super powers. They plan to take control of the earth and use it as a hunting ground to hunt and kill humans.
It is obvious that Rai has secretly joined the creatures, but the purpose is unknown.

### Story Rule:
There's a symbol in the Avatar on which the tribe has placed it in places of ritual or importance, such as their homes or dwellings, and it is shown that this symbol is related to all things on Pandora.
However, there are also many other symbols, such as the figure of a lifelike man, but there is a modern city.
Another symbol is the geometry of the star cornucopia shape pattern set at the entrance of a clan town.
However, the tribe also uses many colored symbols to compliment those of the star and lifelike figures, such as Shooting Stars and fireworks.
Sokame, another device found on Pandora, has the ability to track flora and fauna, their life spans, and Ô¨Çowers.
The Na'vi must complete a six-year training to become elders, much like students who have lost home markers, having to face and overcome a series of trials to prove their worth. (See the RDA manual for more information)

The Qwikster incident occurred when Netflix split their services into two companies, the first called "Netflix" but both used the same website and branding. The second company was named Qwikster, and it would primarily be devoted to renting movies via mail. As an elaborate attempt to separate its streaming and DVD-by-mail businesses, the company branded the separate entities as two separate organizations, and gave new names to its employee base and Iron Mountain subsidiary extensively used for DVD mailing, among other non-streaming activities. However, the goals were less than ambitious from an engineering perspective. The website at both "netflix.com" and "qwikster.com" were combined into a single entity that utilized a common application called Haley. While the performances were impressive, the online benefits were offset by the rushed launch, where the message to users did not match the announcement of potential new services (There were still a few websites for each, but these websites within the CDN were semi-generic) and the resultant low customer satisfaction. Netflix's approximately 2,000 full-time staff worked on its online user experience. Ultimately, the site was taken offline after today's redesign.

### Story Rule:
Eugene Harold Krabs, more commonly known as Mr. Krabs, is a miserly red crab who lives in an anchor with his daughter, Pearl, who is a young whale. He is the owner and founder of the Krusty Krab restaurant.
SpongeBob is a sea sponge with a rectangular shape, despite being designed to look like an actual kitchen sponge. He is light yellow with a light olive-green outline. 
Karen Plankton is a waterproof supercomputer. She is Plankton's wife and sidekick who supplies him with evil plans to steal the Krabby Patty formula. When SpongeBob puts tape on Karen's screen, her speech is muffled. This implies that her screen acts like a mouth.
The Krusty Krab is a fast food restaurant located in Bikini Bottom. The Krabby Patty is the Krusty Krab's signature and popular food item. It is a meatless hamburger of sorts made from seaweed-sea buns, undersea vegetables, condiments, and a patty. 
Bikini Bottom is an undersea city where SpongeBob and his friends live. Boatmobiles are boat-shaped cars which are the main mode of transport for Bikini Bottomites. 
Karen reveals to Plankton that she ordered a baby for them, and a stork drone soon arrives at the Chum Bucket to deliver it. SpongeBob has the ability to filter-feed and reproduce by budding.
Plankton advises Mr. Krabs to marry money; Krabs agrees if possible. That night, Krabs hears crying near Krusty Krab's bus stop. Investigating, he finds a money stack with a face, unaware it's a robot named Cashina controlled by Plankton. Krabs falls in love, proposes to Cashina, and she accepts. The next day, Mr. Krabs and Cashina are officially married after their wedding. The Krabby Patty formula is the sole property of the Krusty Krab and is only to be discussed in part or in whole with its creator, Mr. Krabs. Duplication of this formula is punishable by law. Restrictions apply, results may vary.
The Atlanteans traveled countless light-years from their home planet and brought the oldest living bubble on the journey, living over a million years. The Atlanteans took great advances in weapons, wealth, science, art, and things that people took for granted in Bikini Bottom today. The Weapons Vault contains all Atlantean-created weaponry, as the Atlanteans sealed away their entire arsenal to live in harmony with any sea life around them.
In 6188 B.C., Bikini Bottom population is 23. Seen on SpongeBob's license, on July 14, 1986, SpongeBob was born. Squidward was born on the same year.
The first Neptune dynasty takes throne of Bikini Bottom after the Krabs dynasty loses power (and the krabby patty recipe) in the 12th century.
The Atlanteans' moon was destroyed in a violent battle with another world. The Atlanteans traveled countless light-years in pursuit of the remaining moons afterward and finally settled on an island.
Princess Pearl Krabs was a princess of Bikini Bottomshire sometime before the 12th century and is a medieval ancestor of Pearl Krabs. She first appears in the episode "Dunces and Dragons.">Eugene Harold Krabs, more commonly known as Mr. Krabs, is a miserly red crab who lives in an anchor with his daughter, Pearl, who is a young whale. He is the owner and founder of the Krusty Krab restaurant.
